How to Wash Your Hands

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Hic esse dolore reiciendis sapiente qui quibusdam, reprehenderit libero nobis eveniet, ullam dignissimos tenetur, dolorum debitis.

  1. 1

    Wet Hands

  2. 2

    Apply Soap

  3. 3

    Rub Hands Palm to palm

  4. 4

    Lather The Back of Both Hands

  5. 5

    Scrub Between Your Fingers

  6. 6

    Rub The Back of Fingers on The Opposing Palm

  7. 7

    Clean Thumbs

  8. 8

    Wash Fingernails And Fingertips

  9. 9

    Rinse Hands

  10. 10

    Dry with a Single Use Towel

  11. 11

    Use The Towel to Rurn off The Foucet

  12. 12

    Your Hands Are Clean
